key.name: show-menu-bar
key.summary: Key to show the menu bar while pressed
key.description: Reveals the global menu bar while pressed.

key.name: lock-screen
key.description: Pressing this key will lock the current session.

key.name: show-hud
key.summary: Key to show the HUD when tapped
key.description: A tap on this key summons the HUD.

key.name: execute-command
key.description: Opens a folder or executes a command.

key.name: show-desktop-key
key.description: Hide all windows and focus desktop.

key.name: panel-first-menu
key.summary: Key to open the first panel menu
key.description: Opens the first indicator menu of the Panel, allowing keyboard navigation thereafter.

key.name: spread-app-windows
key.summary: Key to spread the current application windows
key.description: Initiate the window Spread for the current application windows.

key.name: spread-app-windows-anywhere
key.summary: Key to spread the current application windows in any workspace
key.description: Initiate the window Spread for the current application windows, for all the windows.

key.name: panel-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the Panel background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: panel-opacity-maximized-toggle
key.summary: Panel Opacity for Maximized Windows Toggle
key.description: When a window is maximized and visible in the current viewport, the panel opacity is disabled.

key.name: background-color
key.description: Background color override for the Dash, Launcher and Switcher.

key.name: dash-blur-experimental
key.description: Type of blur in the Dash. (0 = No Blur, 1 = Static Blur, 2 = Active Blur)

key.name: automaximize-value
key.description: The minimum value to trigger automaximize. (1 - 100)

key.name: shortcut-overlay
key.description: Enables possibility to display an overlay showing available mouse and keyboard shortcuts.

key.name: override-decoration-theme
key.description: Each Gtk theme can provide shadow parameters, but you can override these values here.

key.name: shadow-x-offset
key.description: Horizontal offset of the shadow. (-10 - 10)

key.name: shadow-y-offset
key.description: Vertical offset of the shadow. (-10 - 10)

key.name: active-shadow-radius
key.description: The radius of the shadow blur for the active window. (1 - 30)

key.name: active-shadow-color
key.description: The color of the shadows for the active window.

key.name: inactive-shadow-radius
key.description: The radius of the shadow blur for the inactive windows. (1 - 30)

key.name: inactive-shadow-color
key.description: The color of the shadows for the inactive windows.

key.name: show-launcher
key.summary: Key to show the Dash, Launcher and Help Overlay
key.description: Holding this key makes the Launcher and Help Overlay appear. Tapping it opens the Dash.

key.name: keyboard-focus
key.summary: Key to give keyboard-focus to the Launcher
key.description: Gives keyboard-focus to the Launcher so it can be navigated with the cursor-keys.

key.name: launcher-switcher-forward
key.summary: Key to start the Launcher Application Switcher
key.description: Cycles through icons present in the Launcher. Activates the highlighted icon on release.

key.name: launcher-switcher-prev
key.summary: Key to start the Launcher Application Switcher in reverse
key.description: Cycles through icons present in the Launcher, in reverse order. Activates the highlighted icon on release.

key.name: dash-tap-duration
key.description: Duration (in millseconds) that will count as a tap for opening the Dash. (1 - 1000)

key.name: launcher-opacity
key.description: The opacity of the Launcher background. (0.0 - 1.0)

key.name: launcher-hide-mode
key.description: Make the Launcher hide automatically after some time of inactivity. (0 = Never, 1 = Autohide)

key.name: autohide-animation
key.description: Animation played when the Launcher is showing or hiding. (0 = Fade on bfb and Slide, 1 = Slide only, 2 = Fade only, 3 = Fade and Slide)

key.name: reveal-trigger
key.description: (0 = Left Edge, 1 = Top Left Corner)

key.name: num-launchers
key.description: Selects on which display the Launcher will be present. (0 = All Displays, 1 = Primary Display)

key.name: launcher-capture-mouse
key.description: Determines if the Launcher's edges will capture the mousepointer.

key.name: scroll-inactive-icons
key.summary: Scroll Inactive Icon to Focus Application
key.description: Allows using the mouse scrollwheel to focus an application if the icon is inactive.

key.name: launcher-minimize-window
key.description: Allows minimizing a single windowed application by clicking on its Launcher icon.

key.name: edge-responsiveness
key.description: A conglomerate setting that modifies the overall responsiveness of the Launcher reveal. (0.2 - 8.0)

key.name: reveal-pressure
key.description: Amount of mouse pressure required to reveal the Launcher. (1 - 1000)

key.name: overcome-pressure
key.description: Amount of mouse pressure required to push the mousepointer into the next monitor. (1 - 1000)

key.name: decay-rate
key.description: The rate at which mouse pressure decays. (1 - 1000)

key.name: stop-velocity
key.description: The maximum velocity at which the mouse will still be stopped. (1 - 1000)

key.name: edge-passed-disabled-ms
key.summary: Duration of Sticky Edge Release after Break
key.description: The number of milliseconds Sticky Edges are deactivated for after the barrier has been broken. (0 - 5000)

key.name: icon-size
key.description: The size of the icons in the Launcher. (8 - 64)

key.name: backlight-mode
key.description: Change how the icons in the Launcher are backlit. (0 = Backlight Always On, 1 = Backlight Toggles, 2 = Backlight Always Off, 3 = Edge Illumination Toggles, 4 = Backlight and Edge Illumination Toggles)

key.name: launch-animation
key.description: The icon animation playing during the launch of a process. (0 = None, 1 = Pulse Until Running, 2 = Blink)

key.name: urgent-animation
key.description: The icon animation playing when a Launcher Icon is in the urgent state. (0 = None, 1 = Pulse, 2 = Wiggle)

key.name: menus-fadein
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-in animation, used when the mouse goes over the top-panel. (0 - 1000)

key.name: menus-fadeout
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-out animation, used when the mouse goes over the top-panel. (0 - 1000)

key.name: menus-discovery-duration
key.description: How many seconds the menus should be shown when a new application has been launched. (0 - 10)

key.name: menus-discovery-fadein
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-in animation, used when the menus of a new launched application have been shown. (0 - 1000)

key.name: menus-discovery-fadeout
key.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the menus fade-out animation, used when the menus of a new launched application have been shown. (0 - 1000)

key.name: alt-tab-forward
key.description: Switches to the next open window on the actual viewport.

key.name: alt-tab-prev
key.summary: Key to switch to the previous window in the Switcher
key.description: Switches to the previous open window on the actual viewport, once the Switcher has been revealed.

key.name: alt-tab-forward-all
key.summary: Key to start the Switcher for all viewports
key.description: Switches to the next open window, including windows of all viewports.

key.name: alt-tab-prev-all
key.summary: Key to switch to the previous window in the Switcher for all viewports
key.description: Switches to the previous open window, once the Switcher has been revealed, including windows of all viewports.

key.name: alt-tab-next-window
key.summary: Key to flip through windows in the Switcher
key.description: Flips through all the windows present in the Switcher.

key.name: alt-tab-prev-window
key.summary: Key to flip through windows in the Switcher backwards
key.description: Flips through all the windows present in the Switcher, in reverse order.

key.name: switch-strictly-between-applications
key.description: Disables the last focused window being the first entry in the Switcher, so Switcher strictly switches between applications

key.name: show-minimized-windows
key.summary: Show live previews of windows in the Switcher
key.description: Enables miniature live window previews in the Switcher.

key.name: alt-tab-timeout
key.summary: Timed automatic to show live previews in the Switcher
key.description: Automatically spreads multiple windows of the same application out into a grid after a short time.

key.name: alt-tab-bias-viewport
key.summary: Bias alt-tab to prefer windows on the current viewport
key.description: Bias the Switcher to prefer windows which are placed on the current viewport.

key.name: disable-show-desktop
key.summary: Disable Show Desktop in the Switcher
key.description: Disables the Show Desktop icon in the Switcher.

key.name: disable-mouse
key.summary: Disable the mouse in the Switcher
key.description: Disables the mouse in the Switcher.
